createTable.remarks: Records the history of billing account changes on billing projects

column.name: BILLING_PROJECT_NAME
column.remarks: Name of the billing project being updated.

column.name: USER_ID
column.remarks: User ID of the user making the change.

column.name: PREVIOUS_BILLING_ACCOUNT
column.remarks: The billing account used by billing project previously.

column.name: NEW_BILLING_ACCOUNT
column.remarks: The new billing account that the user requested for the billing project.

column.name: GOOGLE_SYNC_TIME
column.remarks: When these changes were set on GCP

column.name: OUTCOME
column.remarks: The outcome from Google whether the update was successful

column.name: MESSAGE
column.remarks: Any supplemental message generated by the system, including failure messages.

changeSet.author: ci-mob
changeSet.comment: Enforce that the billing account can't be changed from/to the same billing account.
